creditline: Gift of Peggy and Leonard Lindborg
department: Chinese, South and Southeast Asian Art
description: tall, outward-flaring ring foot; bowl has slightly outward-flaring scalloped rim; green and brown foot; bowl is light blue with dark blue designs in six cartouches at interior with radiating central flower (or sunburst); geometric and organic designs on exterior
medium: Sawankalok ware Glazed ceramic, underglaze brown painted decor
title: Bowl
